ComicInfo.Title: Courage, by Any Other Name...; Mything Lessons!; R & R; Elf Quest; In the Belly of the Golden Whale; Christmas Spirits; The Utripneen Connection; Circus Flambe'
ComicInfo.Summary:
The story of how Redlance received his name.
Aahz attempts to teach Skeeve how to use his magic.
Brent makes a play for Bast but she turns out to be more than he can handle.
